LABEL: 0x2E0
STRING: A groan echoed through the silence.

LABEL: 0x308
STRING: Who did it belong to?

LABEL: 0x38B
STRING: Maybe it came from me.

LABEL: 0x3C3
STRING: A sea of blood spread across my field of vision.

LABEL: 0x3E5
STRING: The dark, discolored pool of liquid extended from the right corner just after the entrance of the bridge to the floor.

LABEL: 0x44F
STRING: The smell of iron filled my nostrils and took over my thoughts.

LABEL: 0x4EA
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x55F
STRING: Why?

LABEL: 0x5D0
STRING: Who?

LABEL: 0x641
STRING: What was happening――?

LABEL: 0x663
STRING: Question after question bounced around inside my mind without an answer.

LABEL: 0x6A1
STRING: My breathing got ragged.

LABEL: 0x6BD
STRING: I couldn't breathe.

LABEL: 0x6D5
STRING: I felt dizzy.

LABEL: 0x746
STRING: ――Stop.

LABEL: 0x75E
STRING: Don't get confused. Get a grip on yourself.

LABEL: 0x786
STRING: Close your eyes and take a deep breath.

LABEL: 0x7AE
STRING: And... breathe out.

LABEL: 0x7D0
STRING: Calm down.

LABEL: 0x84D
STRING: The reddish-black puddle of liquid entered my slowly opening field of vision.

LABEL: 0x893
STRING: And lying in the middle of it was――

LABEL: 0x8BF
STRING: ――A pair of small shoes.

LABEL: 0x9F2
STRING: The size of the shoes made me think of only one person they could belong to.

LABEL: 0xA22
STRING: Why had I... forgotten about her?

LABEL: 0xA56
STRING: Hikari...

LABEL: 0xA6E
STRING: A pale girl who had called herself a poet.

LABEL: 0xA9C
STRING: Touri's sister ended up being Reiri and not her, so...

LABEL: 0xAD2
STRING: ――I didn't even know who she was to begin with.

LABEL: 0xB18
STRING: Or, where she was now...

LABEL: 0xBA5
STRING: ――I didn't know.

LABEL: 0xBC3
STRING: I knew nothing―I didn't even want to think about it.

LABEL: 0xBED
STRING: Why the hell did I remember all of this only now?

LABEL: 0xC23
STRING: The worst-case scenario built itself up in my mind.

LABEL: 0xC59
STRING: Was she... Was Hikari safe?

LABEL: 0xC83
STRING: What... had happened here?

LABEL: 0xD2C
STRING: It was as if the scene wasn't real at all.

LABEL: 0xD60
STRING: The color red was splattered around the bridge.

LABEL: 0xD8A
STRING: It had oxidized, turned black, and stuck to the walls and floor.

LABEL: 0xDC4
STRING: I felt slight nausea at the complex and bizarre contrast of colors.

LABEL: 0xE06
STRING: ...What the hell was this?

LABEL: 0xE2C
STRING: Was the liquid that stained the floor really blood?

LABEL: 0xE64
STRING: It would be more convincing if it were red ink.

LABEL: 0xF08
STRING: 「Reiri...」

LABEL: 0xF27
STRING: Touri's mumbled voice reminded me that the others were here.

LABEL: 0xF6F
STRING: I could see her eyes cloud over.

LABEL: 0xFA9
STRING: What was she thinking? I didn't even need to ask.

LABEL: 0xFDD
STRING: She was thinking of her sister, of course.

LABEL: 0x1005
STRING: It was natural to associate this scene with her still-missing sister.

LABEL: 0x1051
STRING: Besides, Touri hadn't known about Hikari...

LABEL: 0x10A5
STRING: Hiragino silently stared at the blood on the floor.

LABEL: 0x11E5
STRING: While observing cautiously, he crouched down, looked for a moment, and stood up.

LABEL: 0x12A1
STRING: 「...Touri-kun.」

LABEL: 0x12CE
STRING: 「――Hwa, huh?」

LABEL: 0x12F3
STRING: She came back to her senses after being called by name.

LABEL: 0x133B
STRING: Hiragino spoke to her gently as she looked surprised and frightened.

LABEL: 0x1446
STRING: 「Rest assured... This isn't Reiri-kun's blood.」

LABEL: 0x150D
STRING: 「...How do you know that?」

LABEL: 0x153F
STRING: It was a simple question. And seeing that his words weren't convincing enough...

LABEL: 0x158D
STRING: ...Hiragino took one look at me and turned his face downward again.

LABEL: 0x160E
STRING: 「Here, look.」

LABEL: 0x162F
STRING: I crouched down as Hiragino urged me and brought my face close to the pool of blood.

LABEL: 0x1689
STRING: Instantly, a strong smell of iron hit my nose.

LABEL: 0x16B9
STRING: I held one hand over my mouth and observed carefully from close up.

LABEL: 0x16F9
STRING: And then...

LABEL: 0x1720
STRING: 「It's almost dried up.」

LABEL: 0x174F
STRING: ...I see. Hiragino was undoubtedly right.

LABEL: 0x1783
STRING: Although this submarine was a closed space, the temperature and humidity were not much different from that on the surface, thanks to the air conditioning.

LABEL: 0x17E7
STRING: It was only about an hour ago that Reiri had disappeared.

LABEL: 0x1822
STRING: Even if Reiri were to be injured here, there was no time for the blood to dry up.

LABEL: 0x18DA
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x18F6
STRING: 「Ah, those shoes aren't hers either!」

LABEL: 0x1924
STRING: 「They're about the same size as hers, but...」

LABEL: 0x1957
STRING: She said it like she was trying to convince herself.

LABEL: 0x19A9
STRING: So... Whose blood was this..?

LABEL: 0x19D5
STRING: A closed-off bridge.

LABEL: 0x19F7
STRING: Dried bloodstains.

LABEL: 0x1A11
STRING: ...I didn't want to think about it.

LABEL: 0x1A33
STRING: But an image inevitably entered my mind.

LABEL: 0x1ACC
STRING: ――Hikari.

LABEL: 0x1AE4
STRING: What if she was in the front section at the time of the accident...?

LABEL: 0x1B2A
STRING: Images and ideas were connecting one by one in my mind.

LABEL: 0x1B66
STRING: The third party who attacked Reiri...

LABEL: 0x1B88
STRING: What if they had cornered Hikari on the bridge and attacked her as well?

LABEL: 0x1BCA
STRING: And she ran away afterward, not caring that she had lost her shoes...?

LABEL: 0x1C63
STRING: ――No, that couldn't be.

LABEL: 0x1C87
STRING: I shook my head to dispel the idea.

LABEL: 0x1CB5
STRING: I needed to calm down.

LABEL: 0x1CD3
STRING: If I thought about it calmly, it didn't make sense.

LABEL: 0x1D19
STRING: First of all, if she had been in the front section, she would have been found during our search.

LABEL: 0x1D6F
STRING: It was hard to imagine that we wouldn't find her even if she were hiding in the shadows. Besides, there was no point in hiding to begin with.

LABEL: 0x1DCD
STRING: And the second thing――

LABEL: 0x1DEB
STRING: If she was attacked and "ran away"... would she really be able to move with this amount of blood loss?

LABEL: 0x1E37
STRING: Hikari's silhouette was becoming more and more distant in my head.

LABEL: 0x1F2E
STRING: The word "frail" described her body perfectly.

LABEL: 0x1F6A
STRING: It was hard to believe she could handle this much blood loss.

LABEL: 0x1FAC
STRING: And if she had escaped, a trail of blood would have led to the outside of the bridge.

LABEL: 0x209A
STRING: I followed the bloodstains with my eyes and noticed something.

LABEL: 0x20C8
STRING: Upon closer inspection, the trail ended unnaturally at the bridge door.

LABEL: 0x210C
STRING: It was like something had intercepted it.

LABEL: 0x21B0
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0x21D1
STRING: Hiragino returned to me, having carefully observed the bloodstains and the shoes.

LABEL: 0x221D
STRING: 「Well... Look here.」

LABEL: 0x22EE
STRING: He stepped inside the bridge, avoiding the bloodstains.

LABEL: 0x2332
STRING: Tokiwa and Touri remained outside the bridge door.

LABEL: 0x236C
STRING: They were crouching.

LABEL: 0x238E
STRING: Or rather, Tokiwa held and supported Touri, who was too shocked to stand up properly.

LABEL: 0x23F6
STRING: From the looks of it, they wouldn't be stepping inside.

LABEL: 0x2436
STRING: ――Okay.

LABEL: 0x244E
STRING: After checking, I pressed the switch on the wall.

LABEL: 0x2486
STRING: The watertight door closed, and Touri and Tokiwa disappeared behind it.

LABEL: 0x24D0
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x24E8
STRING: On the door that had just closed was...

LABEL: 0x257E
STRING: 「I see...」

LABEL: 0x25A1
STRING: As I expected, the watertight door was stained red.

LABEL: 0x25CD
STRING: The stains left on the walls and floor matched the ones on the door perfectly.

LABEL: 0x260F
STRING: In other words, someone who fell here was injured by this "closed bulkhead."

LABEL: 0x2661
STRING: If I looked closely, I could see a large bloodstain followed by a fainter one on the watertight door, as if it had been smeared.

LABEL: 0x26C3
STRING: I confirmed that it was dry with my finger.

LABEL: 0x2703
STRING: Hiragino, who was watching the whole thing, scratched his head with a grave look on his face.

LABEL: 0x2810
STRING: 「Well, this should explain it.」

LABEL: 0x2841
STRING: 「Yeah...」

LABEL: 0x2875
STRING: The blood trail blocked by the door.

LABEL: 0x2899
STRING: The absence of victim and culprit.

LABEL: 0x28BD
STRING: In other words――

LABEL: 0x28D5
STRING: After "someone" was injured and trapped here,

LABEL: 0x292B
STRING: this door was opened once before the blood had dried up.

LABEL: 0x295B
STRING: Was it opened from the outside?

LABEL: 0x2987
STRING: It could have been the person who attacked Reiri, or it could have been one of us.

LABEL: 0x29DA
STRING: 「...Let's leave.」

LABEL: 0x29FB
STRING: 「Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x2A6E
STRING: The door closed.

LABEL: 0x2A88
STRING: The small shoes were left behind inside the bridge.

LABEL: 0x2B75
STRING: 「I don't know what happened here, but let's leave it for the time being.」

LABEL: 0x2BC8
STRING: 「But with all that blood...」

LABEL: 0x2BF2
STRING: He nodded as if he understood.

LABEL: 0x2C90
STRING: 「At any rate, if we check every place in the process of looking for Reiri, we should be able to find our injured person too.」

LABEL: 0x2D53
STRING: 「Besides, our fears are no more than delusions right now.」

LABEL: 0x2D91
STRING: 「It's possible that those bloodstains were left before the accident.」

LABEL: 0x2E6E
STRING: 「We can't deny the possibility that the owner of that bloodstain has already lost their life.」

LABEL: 0x2ECA
STRING: 「In any case, it would be hard to find the victim with this little information... It could turn out to be a waste of time.」

LABEL: 0x2F22
STRING: 「Finding Reiri-kun should be our priority.」

LABEL: 0x2F5A
STRING: 「Don't you think so?」

LABEL: 0x2F7B
STRING: Hiragino was right.

LABEL: 0x2FB5
STRING: I looked back to Touri and Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x3099
STRING: I didn't know how well the girls understood the current situation, but they didn't object, at least.

LABEL: 0x319D
STRING: 「Well then...」

LABEL: 0x31B7
STRING: 「Reiri-kun wasn't on the third-floor bridge.」

LABEL: 0x31E9
STRING: 「The second-floor bridge is closed.」

LABEL: 0x3272
STRING: 「Then, the remaining areas would be either the first-floor bridge or...」

LABEL: 0x32BC
STRING: 「――Beyond that, the rear section.」

LABEL: 0x3309
STRING: A trail of blood.

LABEL: 0x331F
STRING: Left behind shoes.

LABEL: 0x3337
STRING: Reiri.

LABEL: 0x334B
STRING: Someone who was injured.

LABEL: 0x3369
STRING: Hikari.

LABEL: 0x337D
STRING: Someone who was attacked here.

LABEL: 0x33A5
STRING: A wounded girl.

LABEL: 0x33C1
STRING: A girl who never woke up.

LABEL: 0x33DD
STRING: A girl collapsed in pain.

LABEL: 0x33FF
STRING: Touri.

LABEL: 0x3413
STRING: Fragmented thoughts kept piling up inside my head.

LABEL: 0x3439
STRING: I would never get to the truth no matter how far I reached.

LABEL: 0x34CA
STRING: Helplessness.

LABEL: 0x350A
STRING: 「I... have to do something-」

LABEL: 0x353A
STRING: Why... why did it end up like this?

LABEL: 0x356A
STRING: I had been, for what it was worth, too relaxed.

LABEL: 0x35A6
STRING: Somehow, I believed that it couldn't get any worse than it was.

LABEL: 0x35E4
STRING: I was wrong.

LABEL: 0x3600
STRING: The world was not so kind.

LABEL: 0x3626
STRING: If you were not careful, things could always go from bad to worse.

LABEL: 0x365C
STRING: Bit by bit, little by little, we were falling toward the bottom.

LABEL: 0x369A
STRING: We just didn't realize it until we were already falling, and I was sure that even now, we...

LABEL: 0x3733
STRING: 「Shit――!」

LABEL: 0x374F
STRING: I started running.

LABEL: 0x377C
STRING: 「Hey, wait――」

LABEL: 0x37A1
STRING: A voice rang out from behind me.

LABEL: 0x37C9
STRING: I didn't turn around.

LABEL: 0x3851
STRING: I ran down the stairs to the first floor.

LABEL: 0x3881
STRING: What I was aiming for was clear―the bridge leading to the rear section.

LABEL: 0x395D
STRING: What awaited me was a closed watertight door.

LABEL: 0x3987
STRING: 「Haah, haah...」

LABEL: 0x39A7
STRING: ...Would it open?

LABEL: 0x39C1
STRING: It should.

LABEL: 0x39DB
STRING: Yesterday, I came back from the rear section to the front through this bridge.

LABEL: 0x3A2F
STRING: While carrying Reiri...

LABEL: 0x3A4F
STRING: I pressed the button on the side.

LABEL: 0x3A71
STRING: The door opened, exposing the bridge.

LABEL: 0x3B08
STRING: ...No one was here.

LABEL: 0x3B26
STRING: The faintly damp air caressed my skin.

LABEL: 0x3B56
STRING: I slowly made my way toward the other side of the bridge.

LABEL: 0x3B8A
STRING: No one was here.

LABEL: 0x3BA4
STRING: Nothing.

LABEL: 0x3BBC
STRING: In the silence, as if time had stopped, I could only hear the sound of my own echoing footsteps.

LABEL: 0x3C36
STRING: The back of the bridge.

LABEL: 0x3C52
STRING: Another door. If only this one opened too...

LABEL: 0x3C84
STRING: If it opened...

LABEL: 0x3F29
STRING: ――Damn it.

LABEL: 0x3F41
STRING: I shouldn't be faltering in a situation like this.

LABEL: 0x3F7D
STRING: My trembling fingertips were held back by my other hand.

LABEL: 0x3FAF
STRING: Just one more step, and I'd be able to enter the rear section.

LABEL: 0x403E
STRING: There was still a possibility left behind this closed door.

LABEL: 0x408A
STRING: And still...!

LABEL: 0x4109
STRING: 「Shit!!」

LABEL: 0x4123
STRING: The door didn't budge an inch as I hit it.

LABEL: 0x4159
STRING: Why――why am I――!

LABEL: 0x417F
STRING: Suddenly, I could feel my heart pounding loudly in my chest.

LABEL: 0x41A7
STRING: I felt dizzy, as if I'd just had a drink for the first time.

LABEL: 0x4238
STRING: My consciousness was fading. I was dazed.

LABEL: 0x425C
STRING: The black spots in my vision widened and then converged.

LABEL: 0x428E
STRING: I couldn't stay upright and fell forward on the spot.

LABEL: 0x42E5
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun!」

LABEL: 0x4310
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x4331
STRING: In the meantime, Hiragino and the others had caught up to me.

LABEL: 0x4499
STRING: 「Are you okay?!」

LABEL: 0x44C6
STRING: 「Katagiri-san!」

LABEL: 0x44E4
STRING: 「Your face is all blue!」

LABEL: 0x4543
STRING: I brushed off Touri's hand on my shoulder.

LABEL: 0x4579
STRING: 「I'm fine, so...」

LABEL: 0x459B
STRING: What the hell was I doing?

LABEL: 0x45C7
STRING: This wasn't the time for this.

LABEL: 0x4646
STRING: ――I pressed the button.

LABEL: 0x4666
STRING: That wasn't so hard, was it?

LABEL: 0x469A
STRING: The door opened easily, like it didn't care one bit about my inner conflict.

LABEL: 0x473B
STRING: ――At that moment.

LABEL: 0x4753
STRING: I felt a sensation wash over my feet.

LABEL: 0x4788
STRING: 「Water...」

LABEL: 0x4804
STRING: The seawater, still undrained from last night, was cold and soaked to my feet and socks.

LABEL: 0x4854
STRING: It was like a wave crashing over――

LABEL: 0x4998
STRING: 「Aaaaaaaahhh!!」

LABEL: 0x4A31
STRING: 「Eek!」

LABEL: 0x4A4E
STRING: I jumped back, pushing Touri away.

LABEL: 0x4B42
STRING: I immediately looked up, and my eyes met with Hiragino's.

LABEL: 0x4B8E
STRING: He closed the door while holding me.

LABEL: 0x4C2E
STRING: 「...It's fine.」

LABEL: 0x4C4C
STRING: 「You need to go and rest.」

LABEL: 0x4C77
STRING: 「But――」

LABEL: 0x4D17
STRING: 「Do you have to be "ordered," as well?」

LABEL: 0x4D6A
STRING: He stared at me with a stern look.

LABEL: 0x4D8E
STRING: There was a hint of melancholy in his eyes, however.

LABEL: 0x4DE0
STRING: 「――Damn it.」

LABEL: 0x4DFC
STRING: I pounded the wall again with my fist.

LABEL: 0x4E24
STRING: In this situation, there was no way I could go to the rear section without Hiragino's say.

LABEL: 0x4E88
STRING: How disappointing.

LABEL: 0x4EA8
STRING: How pathetic――

LABEL: 0x4EDB
STRING: 「Katagiri-san...」

LABEL: 0x4EFE
STRING: Touri called out to me in a reserved manner as I fell to the floor, sitting down against the wall.

LABEL: 0x4FA9
STRING: 「Sorry... It's fine so...」

LABEL: 0x4FD1
STRING: 「Your sister... Reiri, I'll...」

LABEL: 0x5065
STRING: 「Yeah, thanks.」

LABEL: 0x5087
STRING: 「But right now, it's important that you take care and not push yourself.」

LABEL: 0x5132
STRING: 「I'll be fine.」

LABEL: 0x515B
STRING: I looked up at the strength of those words.

LABEL: 0x51F7
STRING: 「――Reiri,

LABEL: 0x520E
STRING: I'll find her.」

LABEL: 0x5233
STRING: Her eyes were filled with determination.

LABEL: 0x5253
STRING: Touri smiled.

LABEL: 0x527B
STRING: She really was a strong girl...

LABEL: 0x52BD
STRING: I looked at Hiragino.

LABEL: 0x534A
STRING: 「Sorry...」

LABEL: 0x5368
STRING: 「Can I leave the rear section to you two, Hiragino-san?」

LABEL: 0x540A
STRING: 「Sure thing.」

LABEL: 0x542B
STRING: Hiragino gave me a firm thumbs up.

LABEL: 0x5462
STRING: 「Katagiri-kun, please search the front section again with Tokiwa-kun.」

LABEL: 0x54C1
STRING: With that, Hiragino turned his back, and they passed through the door he had opened himself, exiting the bridge accompanied by the sound of water.

LABEL: 0x57C3
STRING: After seeing them off, I left the bridge and decided to return to the lobby in the front section.

LABEL: 0x581F
STRING: My wet feet began to dry as I made my way through the corridor.

LABEL: 0x584D
STRING: That wasn't good at all, now that I thought about it.

LABEL: 0x5871
STRING: I left Hiragino and Touri in charge and did nothing myself.

LABEL: 0x58C1
STRING: Hiragino and Touri...

LABEL: 0x58DD
STRING: I assumed Yukari was still asleep, but where did Tokiwa go?

LABEL: 0x5919
STRING: I noticed her absence just now.

LABEL: 0x59E9
STRING: As I stepped into the lobby, I saw Tokiwa's figure lying sprawled on her back at my feet.

LABEL: 0x5A43
STRING: 「...At least sleep on the couch.」

LABEL: 0x5A88
STRING: 「Oh, if it isn't лл-san.」

LABEL: 0x5ABB
STRING: 「Stop calling me that.」

LABEL: 0x5AD9
STRING: I knew it was selfish for me to say that now, but...

LABEL: 0x5B13
STRING: Maybe she was just trying to harass me by calling me that.

LABEL: 0x5C2E
STRING: Opening her eyes, Tokiwa rolled around on the floor and stood up quickly.

LABEL: 0x5CF5
STRING: 「Good morning.」

LABEL: 0x5D1E
STRING: 「...Morning.」

LABEL: 0x5D4B
STRING: 「Well, shall we go then?」

LABEL: 0x5D76
STRING: Tokiwa grabbed me by the arm as I replied without hiding my listlessness.

LABEL: 0x5E3C
STRING: 「Now―to the deep sea!」

LABEL: 0x5E87
STRING: ...We were already here, weren't we?

LABEL: 0x5EBF
STRING: What was she talking about?

LABEL: 0x5EE5
STRING: No, perhaps――

LABEL: 0x5F15
STRING: I shook off her arm.

LABEL: 0x5F5D
STRING: 「Don't tell me you're talking about going outside of the <SHEEP III>?」

LABEL: 0x6002
STRING: 「Of course I am.」

LABEL: 0x6033
STRING: And what kind of thought process led her to that?

LABEL: 0x6073
STRING: This girl genius's trail of thought was untraceable.

LABEL: 0x60A7
STRING: Going outside the submarine while we were still searching for Reiri was just――

LABEL: 0x60F1
STRING: 「――You don't actually think Reiri is out there, right?」

LABEL: 0x619D
STRING: 「Not really, no.」

LABEL: 0x61D0
STRING: Hey.

LABEL: 0x61E8
STRING: Then what? Was she expecting to find the culprit who attacked Reiri or... Hikari out there?

LABEL: 0x6258
STRING: 「Listen, Tokiwa――」

LABEL: 0x627C
STRING: 「The diving suit I used yesterday is over there.」

LABEL: 0x62B6
STRING: My comrade in arms was lying in the corner of the lobby.

LABEL: 0x6351
STRING: 「Once you try putting that, you'll see it's not something you can do alone.」

LABEL: 0x63AD
STRING: 「I could barely get the helmet on and off by myself.」

LABEL: 0x63EE
STRING: 「Right.」

LABEL: 0x6409
STRING: 「In other words, there's no way that Reiri went out there.」

LABEL: 0x643E
STRING: 「And there's no way that this "someone" who attacked her did either.」

LABEL: 0x64FA
STRING: 「Huh.」

LABEL: 0x6515
STRING: 「So, if we go out there right now, we're not going to get anything out of it.」

LABEL: 0x65B9
STRING: 「That's wrong.」

LABEL: 0x65DE
STRING: Tokiwa was being fickle as usual, so I had no idea what she wanted to look outside for.

LABEL: 0x6634
STRING: And that was why, hearing the strong will behind her voice, I couldn't help but feel its power.

LABEL: 0x6690
STRING: She continued slowly.

LABEL: 0x66C9
STRING: 「I only said, "Let's go to the deep sea."」

LABEL: 0x6703
STRING: 「I didn't say anything about looking for Reiri-san or this "someone."」

LABEL: 0x6749
STRING: 「Not a word.」

LABEL: 0x67F2
STRING: 「Listen.」

LABEL: 0x6813
STRING: Tokiwa raised a finger.

LABEL: 0x6844
STRING: 「The communications will be restored at 13:00.」

LABEL: 0x6877
STRING: Yes, that they should.

LABEL: 0x6899
STRING: But even if we were to make contact, I honestly didn't know if help would arrive any time soon.

LABEL: 0x690B
STRING: There would be a delay, and depending on the situation on the surface, who knew how long we'd have to wait.

LABEL: 0x6977
STRING: Once contact with the ground was established, it wasn't like we would be rescued immediately...

LABEL: 0x69C5
STRING: Even the rescuers had to get prepared.

LABEL: 0x69F3
STRING: We couldn't do anything about things we couldn't control, and we might get even busier than we were now.

LABEL: 0x6AB1
STRING: 「When, if ever, will we have another opportunity to go the deep sea?」

LABEL: 0x6AF2
STRING: I spun around and glanced at the clock on the wall.

LABEL: 0x6B26
STRING: It was just past 11:00.

LABEL: 0x6B4E
STRING: We might have enough time to go outside and come back.

LABEL: 0x6B9A
STRING: We wouldn't have that much time left if we waited another hour...

LABEL: 0x6BD9
STRING: No, even now there wasn't much leeway.

LABEL: 0x6C7F
STRING: 「If one is to go out there, now's the time.」

LABEL: 0x6CAE
STRING: ...Yes.

LABEL: 0x6CC6
STRING: I see...

LABEL: 0x6CE0
STRING: 「Hey, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0x6D02
STRING: 「There's something I want to ask you.」

LABEL: 0x6D26
STRING: 「Why do you want to go out there in the first place?」

LABEL: 0x6DBD
STRING: Hiragino and Touri were searching for Reiri as we spoke.

LABEL: 0x6E01
STRING: I was certain she saw the crimson blood before on the bridge.

LABEL: 0x6E39
STRING: Could she not understand the situation, even now?

LABEL: 0x6E85
STRING: Going out there for no good reason was unthinkable.

LABEL: 0x6ED7
STRING: Did she not get that?!

LABEL: 0x6F23
STRING: Tokiwa looked surprised, then hung her head.

LABEL: 0x6F9A
STRING: 「Why are you asking that...?」

LABEL: 0x6FD5
STRING: Her voice was trembling...

LABEL: 0x6FF1
STRING: Uhh... huh?

LABEL: 0x7009
STRING: Was she crying?

LABEL: 0x7021
STRING: Tokiwa trembled as she grabbed the hem of her vividly-colored kimono.

LABEL: 0x706B
STRING: Um, w-what, why?

LABEL: 0x708F
STRING: What was she doing?

LABEL: 0x70A7
STRING: Did she really want to go out to the sea so badly?

LABEL: 0x70D3
STRING: Even if she did, there was no good reason to――

LABEL: 0x711B
STRING: Right――

LABEL: 0x71FC
STRING: 「All right, leave it to me!」

LABEL: 0x721C
STRING: 「I'll definitely get you your Scalyfoot!」

LABEL: 0x72B8
STRING: 「Banzaai!」

LABEL: 0x734A
STRING: 「It's a promise.」

LABEL: 0x736D
STRING: 「――Yeah.」

LABEL: 0x73FE
STRING: Was that it...?

LABEL: 0x7422
STRING: I did make that promise, sure...

LABEL: 0x7458
STRING: But... now?

LABEL: 0x74DE
STRING: 「Do you understand what I'm getting at?」

LABEL: 0x7517
STRING: 「Ah, no...」

LABEL: 0x754F
STRING: Tokiwa grabbed my arm like a hunter its prey.

LABEL: 0x75F3
STRING: 「This calls for quick action.」

LABEL: 0x7611
STRING: 「The diving suit is here, too.」

LABEL: 0x7696
STRING: 「Come on, let's go.」

LABEL: 0x76BF
STRING: I didn't know when she regained her vigor, or maybe that was just an act...?

LABEL: 0x772F
STRING: I turned around as she pulled me by my arm.

LABEL: 0x77CE
STRING: I saw the rear section in the distance.

LABEL: 0x77F2
STRING: An open watertight door.

LABEL: 0x7814
STRING: And beyond that...

LABEL: 0x782E
STRING: Were those two, somewhere... And Reiri as well.

LABEL: 0x78BB
STRING: Maybe I should follow them after all?

LABEL: 0x78F3
STRING: After all, this trauma was nothing but a product of my imagination...

LABEL: 0x7937
STRING: I was the cause of all of this, yet here I was――

LABEL: 0x79D6
STRING: 「Wait, Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0x79FC
STRING: Before I knew it, I had raised my voice.

LABEL: 0x7A24
STRING: 「I get what you're saying, and I don't think you're wrong, but...」

LABEL: 0x7A6C
STRING: 「I have a responsibility.」

LABEL: 0x7A96
STRING: 「At the very least, let's wait until things have calmed down...」

LABEL: 0x7AD2
STRING: I voiced my honest thoughts.

LABEL: 0x7AEC
STRING: There were things I couldn't give up on, even if I was often carried away by the flow.

LABEL: 0x7B99
STRING: Tokiwa turned to face me head-on as I shook off my arm again.

LABEL: 0x7BEC
STRING: 「Is that okay?」

LABEL: 0x7C08
STRING: 「Now's the only time.」

LABEL: 0x7C3B
STRING: Her expression was sincere.

LABEL: 0x7C55
STRING: It wasn't an expression of indecipherable indifference, nor one that conveyed a strong will.

LABEL: 0x7CC5
STRING: This must be the real Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0x7CFD
STRING: And so, without any act whatsoever, the genius girl began to talk.

LABEL: 0x7DA5
STRING: 「I see. It may indeed seem imprudent to you.」

LABEL: 0x7DEF
STRING: 「But there's no point in regretting what happened.」

LABEL: 0x7E35
STRING: 「...Even if you were involved.」

LABEL: 0x7E6D
STRING: 「Isn't that right?」

LABEL: 0x7E92
STRING: 「That's――」

LABEL: 0x7EAE
STRING: Sound reasoning.

LABEL: 0x7EC2
STRING: But as an ordinary person, I couldn't believe in a clear solution like that.

LABEL: 0x7EFC
STRING: I was bound by responsibility.

LABEL: 0x7F8C
STRING: 「I want to satisfy my intellectual curiosity.」

LABEL: 0x7FCF
STRING: 「...You're still young.」

LABEL: 0x7FF1
STRING: 「You'll have plenty of opportunities to go into the deep sea――」

LABEL: 0x8040
STRING: 「I won't.」

LABEL: 0x8061
STRING: Her words were abnormally forceful.

LABEL: 0x80F3
STRING: 「I won't have more opportunities.」

LABEL: 0x812C
STRING: Why did she look so... sad?

LABEL: 0x8173
STRING: 「I conduct research out of my own curiosity.」

LABEL: 0x81B1
STRING: 「And certainly, I've been guaranteed the right to do it somewhat independently.」

LABEL: 0x826C
STRING: 「But, listen to me.」

LABEL: 0x8290
STRING: 「Talent is something that's given.」

LABEL: 0x82BE
STRING: 「I'm doing the research because I have the ability.」

LABEL: 0x831B
STRING: Given talent.

LABEL: 0x8339
STRING: Given right.

LABEL: 0x8357
STRING: Given duty.

LABEL: 0x8375
STRING: If her own genius that controlled her wasn't something she had gained through hard work,

LABEL: 0x83D5
STRING: then what was the difference between that and the constraints one was subjected to from birth?

LABEL: 0x8483
STRING: 「So far, I've said countless times that I wanted to ride on a submarine.」

LABEL: 0x84DF
STRING: 「I've always wanted to see the deep sea with my own eyes.」

LABEL: 0x851F
STRING: 「I wasn't allowed to even once, of course.」

LABEL: 0x85B2
STRING: 「――But, this time.」

LABEL: 0x85D2
STRING: 「The boarding number I was given was 001.」

LABEL: 0x8607
STRING: 「There was no raffle, and it was decided that I'd be on board earlier than the crew.」

LABEL: 0x8665
STRING: 「The conditions for boarding this ship were presented to me.」

LABEL: 0x86A1
STRING: 「A compensation for my research, in other words.」

LABEL: 0x86E4
STRING: This time, Tokiwa didn't forcefully grab my arm.

LABEL: 0x872A
STRING: She smoothly held out her supple white hand, devoid of any traces of suntan.

LABEL: 0x87DC
STRING: 「Could you take me with you?」

LABEL: 0x8813
STRING: ...What should I do?

LABEL: 0x8835
STRING: Should I obey her, or――

LABEL: 0x886F
STRING: I was well aware of the dangers.

LABEL: 0x8897
STRING: But...

LABEL: 0x8935
STRING: 「I won't have more opportunities.」

LABEL: 0x896E
STRING: The genius girl's powerless words.

LABEL: 0x899C
STRING: Her feelings of having everything unjustly taken away resonated with my own.

LABEL: 0x8A68
STRING: She came here, staking everything on this voyage, because she had been deprived, kept secret, and not allowed to know anything by someone.

LABEL: 0x8ADE
STRING: Tokiwa was the same as me.

LABEL: 0x8B04
STRING: And as someone else――

LABEL: 0x8B2E
STRING: All this time, I'd only thought about how I had involved Touri and Reiri, but I'd been foolish.

LABEL: 0x8BA0
STRING: I was sure everyone boarded the <SHEEP III> with hope in their hearts――

LABEL: 0x8C53
STRING: ――And the one who crushed those hopes was me.

LABEL: 0x8C99
STRING: I took Tokiwa's hand.

LABEL: 0x8D5B
STRING: 「I get it.」

LABEL: 0x8DED
STRING: 「――Really?!」

LABEL: 0x8E14
STRING: 「Yeah. It's no use lying.」

LABEL: 0x8E42
STRING: 「Let's hurry――」

LABEL: 0x8E7C
STRING: If Hiragino found out, he'd definitely get mad...

LABEL: 0x8EB6
STRING: I felt a sliver of regret, but this was no time to worry about that.

LABEL: 0x8F02
STRING: Now that I'd decided to do it, I couldn't let it end with a half-assed result.

LABEL: 0x8F4C
STRING: I immediately grabbed the pressure-resistant diving suit beside me.

LABEL: 0x8F8A
STRING: 「――Heavy!」

LABEL: 0x8FAB
STRING: As I thought, the weight of this thing was more than trivial.

LABEL: 0x8FDF
STRING: I remembered how Hiragino and I had carried it together yesterday.

LABEL: 0x9085
STRING: 「What are you doing?」

LABEL: 0x90B2
STRING: 「Well, it's just...」

LABEL: 0x9142
STRING: 「Geez, hurry it up.」

LABEL: 0x9171
STRING: ...I won't say anything.

LABEL: 0x91AB
STRING: I somehow managed to drag the swimsuit along, even though I was completely exhausted.

LABEL: 0x91EB
STRING: Don't underestimate the strength of an inactive IT student!

LABEL: 0x9221
STRING: ...Was I going to have to lug this thing all the way to the third floor...?

LABEL: 0x924D
STRING: Don't be stupid...

LABEL: 0x92E9
STRING: 「Well, I guess it can't be helped.」

LABEL: 0x936A
STRING: 「Let's use the elevator.」

LABEL: 0x939B
STRING: Tokiwa pointed at the big elevator in the center of the lobby.

LABEL: 0x9458
STRING: Just like the one in the rear section, this elevator was sturdy enough to serve as a central pillar supporting the <SHEEP III> itself...

LABEL: 0x94C7
STRING: 「Huh, does it work?」

LABEL: 0x94E5
STRING: The light wasn't on, so I thought it had broken down during the accident.

LABEL: 0x9556
STRING: 「Only the display panel's broken.」

LABEL: 0x9584
STRING: 「See?」

LABEL: 0x959F
STRING: She pressed the button, and the door opened.

LABEL: 0x95C7
STRING: Aah, what a blessing...

LABEL: 0x9646
STRING: Wait a minute!

LABEL: 0x9660
STRING: Since yesterday and this morning, I'd been going back and forth up and down the stairs with all that heavy baggage!

LABEL: 0x96C4
STRING: If the elevator was usable, tell me sooner...

LABEL: 0x9778
STRING: 「Even the elevator in the submerged rear section moved, right?」

LABEL: 0x97C1
STRING: She was right.

LABEL: 0x97E1
STRING: It was my fault for not checking.

LABEL: 0x9827
STRING: I put the diving suit inside the elevator.

LABEL: 0x9853
STRING: And the tank... I wondered if there was enough oxygen.

LABEL: 0x9889
STRING: 「Good, let's ride.」

LABEL: 0x9915
STRING: 「There should be another diving suit.」

LABEL: 0x994E
STRING: ...I was surprised she remembered.

LABEL: 0x9972
STRING: It was true that there was another untouched diving suit inside the warehouse yesterday.

LABEL: 0x99BC
STRING: Was she telling me to bring that too?

LABEL: 0x99E6
STRING: No matter how much she asked, I wouldn't――

LABEL: 0x9A88
STRING: 「I'll leave it to you.」

LABEL: 0x9B3E
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0x9B56
STRING: I managed to drag out the other diving suit and tank...

LABEL: 0x9B9E
STRING: I searched for a spare tank just in case but couldn't find one.

LABEL: 0x9BDE
STRING: Well, it wasn't like we'd run out of oxygen in just an hour or so.

LABEL: 0x9C26
STRING: But still...

LABEL: 0x9C44
STRING: This was definitely going to make my muscles ache tomorrow... Don't underestimate science students...

LABEL: 0x9D30
STRING: I quickly loaded the suit into the elevator and reached for the switch to head straight up.

LABEL: 0x9E4B
STRING: 「Oh, wait!」

LABEL: 0x9E74
STRING: 「Give me the key.」

LABEL: 0x9EB1
STRING: I gave her the keycard, and she ran off somewhere.

LABEL: 0x9EFB
STRING: Was she headed for... the laboratory?

LABEL: 0x9F7C
STRING: After a while, Tokiwa returned while holding some kind of round metal ball.

LABEL: 0x9FCC
STRING: There was a round window on its side.

LABEL: 0x9FF6
STRING: It looked pretty heavy...

LABEL: 0xA018
STRING: 「What's that...?」

LABEL: 0xA045
STRING: 「It's a high-pressure environment tank that can capture and raise deep-sea creatures.」

LABEL: 0xA09F
STRING: 「Without this, even if we catch one, most of the creatures will die from the pressure differential.」

LABEL: 0xA0F5
STRING: 「Since we're going to the deep sea, we need to be prepared.」

LABEL: 0xA13C
STRING: I see...

LABEL: 0xA1C4
STRING: 「With that said, we're ready to go.」

LABEL: 0xA272
STRING: This time, I closed the elevator door.

LABEL: 0xA2A4
STRING: While feeling the gravity, the closed cage rose upward.

LABEL: 0xA5B4
STRING: All the tools were ready.

LABEL: 0xA5D0
STRING: I lined up the diving suits in front of the hatch.

LABEL: 0xA5FA
STRING: It was a bit of a challenge to carry them all the way here, but the real deal was yet to come.

LABEL: 0xA63A
STRING: 「Well, I guess I'll put it on――」

LABEL: 0xA664
STRING: ...And, I froze while thinking that.

LABEL: 0xA68E
STRING: Come to think of it――

LABEL: 0xA6AA
STRING: I couldn't put this on by myself.

LABEL: 0xA6DA
STRING: I doubted she'd be able to put on the other diving suit, either.

LABEL: 0xA736
STRING: Which meant...

LABEL: 0xA7C2
STRING: 「? What's wrong?」

LABEL: 0xA7EF
STRING: 「Sorry, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0xA80F
STRING: 「Seems like only one of us can go out there...」

LABEL: 0xA841
STRING: Why did we even bring two of these heavy diving suits all the way here?

LABEL: 0xA881
STRING: No, there was no point worrying about what's already happened. Let's switch gears.

LABEL: 0xA8DF
STRING: But, this wasn't good.

LABEL: 0xA909
STRING: Judging from the flow of events, it was probably safe to say Tokiwa was the one wanting to go out to the sea.

LABEL: 0xA95F
STRING: ...Was I going to let her go alone?

LABEL: 0xA98F
STRING: Which meant――

LABEL: 0xAA28
STRING: 「Yay, it's a hallucigenia!」

LABEL: 0xAA52
STRING: 「Wait―」

LABEL: 0xAA6A
STRING: 「Oh, and that's an opabinia―」

LABEL: 0xAA96
STRING: 「There's also an anomalocaris―」

LABEL: 0xAABE
STRING: 「Ahaha―」

LABEL: 0xAAD8
STRING: 「Ufufu―」

LABEL: 0xAB97
STRING: It was no use.

LABEL: 0xABAD
STRING: I tried to sound as calm as possible as I addressed Tokiwa.

LABEL: 0xABF3
STRING: 「Ahem...」

LABEL: 0xAC11
STRING: 「Hey, Tokiwa?」

LABEL: 0xAC9B
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0xACBE
STRING: 「Um, this is kinda hard to say...」

LABEL: 0xACEE
STRING: 「Maybe we should do this after Hiragino and the others return after all.」

LABEL: 0xAE7B
STRING: 「Hyoo!」

LABEL: 0xAE9F
STRING: Tokiwa froze with a strange cry.

LABEL: 0xAECF
STRING: What was with that voice...?

LABEL: 0xAEEF
STRING: And before I knew it, her eyes were getting increasingly wet. Ah, this is bad!

LABEL: 0xAF3B
STRING: 「Well, you know, even if we do this right now, only one person can――」

LABEL: 0xAFE9
STRING: 「Then I'll go!」

LABEL: 0xB01A
STRING: ――Wait!

LABEL: 0xB034
STRING: Why did she not hesitate at all?

LABEL: 0xB07C
STRING: Before I could stop her, Tokiwa jumped into a diving suit.

LABEL: 0xB0BC
STRING: I called out to her, half-resigned.

LABEL: 0xB0EA
STRING: 「I'm telling you, it's dangerous――」

LABEL: 0xB184
STRING: 「Now then... This is surprisingly heavy...」

LABEL: 0xB211
STRING: 「This is the arm, and this is the leg...?」

LABEL: 0xB29A
STRING: 「Would this be the head, then?」

LABEL: 0xB2C1
STRING: 「Besides, if we tell them what happened, maybe they'll let us go anyway.」

LABEL: 0xB327
STRING: You know, if we properly explained to Hiragino and... Yukari...

LABEL: 0xB4E6
STRING: ...Ahh, I guess it was impossible...

LABEL: 0xB56B
STRING: 「No, but, you know...」

LABEL: 0xB591
STRING: ――And.

LABEL: 0xB5A7
STRING: Tokiwa had gone quiet before I knew it.

LABEL: 0xB5D9
STRING: Or rather, she was frozen in place in front of the diving suit.

LABEL: 0xB69B
STRING: 「...How do you wear this?」

LABEL: 0xB6EE
STRING: The pressure-resistant diving suit was built to be as sturdy as a space suit.

LABEL: 0xB738
STRING: It was pretty thick, but there was room for your arms and legs inside.

LABEL: 0xB7A0
STRING: ――However.

LABEL: 0xB7BC
STRING: For someone like Tokiwa, who was wearing a kimono, putting one on was impossible.

LABEL: 0xB802
STRING: ...I had a bad feeling about this.

LABEL: 0xB94B
STRING: Aha!」

LABEL: 0xB9C3
STRING: 「This must be in the way!」

LABEL: 0xBA0A
STRING: No sooner had she said that than Tokiwa put a hand on her sash and――Ahh, God, don't do this!

LABEL: 0xBA64
STRING: 「Wait a minute, Tokiwa!」

LABEL: 0xBAFE
STRING: 「What for?」

LABEL: 0xBB7F
STRING: 「I won't wait.」

LABEL: 0xBBD8
STRING: 「――No, wait!」

LABEL: 0xBBFE
STRING: What should I do?

LABEL: 0xBC24
STRING: I had to stop her from fiddling with her kimono... but how?

LABEL: 0xBC80
STRING: If she didn't touch the sash or other dangerous places, it shouldn't come off――

LABEL: 0xBCC8
STRING: While I was preoccupied, Tokiwa had already twirled her sash around――Ahh!

LABEL: 0xBD1F
STRING: 「Okay, it's off.」

LABEL: 0xBD47
STRING: 「Don't take it ooffffff!!!」

LABEL: 0xBD78
STRING: ――Ah!

LABEL: 0xBD90
STRING: If I shouted too loudly and woke Yukari up...

LABEL: 0xBDCE
STRING: I would die before making it to 13:00.

LABEL: 0xBDF8
STRING: As I hesitated, Tokiwa raised her leg and tried to shove herself into the diving suit.

LABEL: 0xBE46
STRING: Since she was raising her leg that high, I could see healthy-looking skin through the cloth without trying.

LABEL: 0xBEA4
STRING: I was a man too, you know?

LABEL: 0xBEC4
STRING: Did she not get that?

LABEL: 0xBEEA
STRING: It usually just peeked out from under the hem of her kimono, but... Argh!

LABEL: 0xBF2E
STRING: She was now struggling with the diving suit with her thighs exposed.

LABEL: 0xBF6A
STRING: What kind of situation was this?!

LABEL: 0xBF8E
STRING: I didn't even know if I should be happy or panic.

LABEL: 0xBFCC
STRING: ...I was already tired of trying to stop her...

LABEL: 0xC00A
STRING: Tokiwa tried her best to fit inside, but then gave up and tilted her head.

LABEL: 0xC0CE
STRING: 「So this cloth is in the way too...」

LABEL: 0xC115
STRING: Saying that, she put her hand on her shoulder.

LABEL: 0xC13D
STRING: Oh, God!

LABEL: 0xC157
STRING: Think of the ratings!

LABEL: 0xC17B
STRING: I balled up the sash she had left on the floor and threw it at her head.

LABEL: 0xC237
STRING: 「Buheh!」

LABEL: 0xC256
STRING: Nice pitch.

LABEL: 0xC278
STRING: The impact of the sash striking her face stopped her in her tracks.

LABEL: 0xC326
STRING: 「...What are you doing?」

LABEL: 0xC351
STRING: 「...Sit down.」

LABEL: 0xC3D7
STRING: 「Clown?」

LABEL: 0xC3FA
STRING: 「Sit down! Right there!」

LABEL: 0xC4F8
STRING: In the end, there was now a girl sitting on her knees in front of me with tears in her eyes, wearing her kimono.

LABEL: 0xC54E
STRING: ...It was a pretty suspicious description from an objective point of view, but it was the truth, so it couldn't be helped.

LABEL: 0xC59A
STRING: 「Look, Tokiwa.」

LABEL: 0xC5BA
STRING: 「You see... You can't just strip in public, especially in front of men.」

LABEL: 0xC606
STRING: 「Yes, it's immoral.」

LABEL: 0xC62E
STRING: 「It's no way for a proper citizen to act.」

LABEL: 0xC6D4
STRING: 「It's bad?」

LABEL: 0xC6F5
STRING: 「It's bad.」

LABEL: 0xC779
STRING: 「No matter what?」

LABEL: 0xC7A0
STRING: 「No matter what.」

LABEL: 0xC8F6
STRING: 「But, it's not like there's anything embarrassing about being seen by someone like you, лл-san.」

LABEL: 0xC950
STRING: 「Since it's you, I don't think you'd do anything to me.」

LABEL: 0xC98C
STRING: 「And more importantly, I wanted to go out to the deep sea.」

LABEL: 0xCA21
STRING: 「Was that wrong?」

LABEL: 0xCA44
STRING: 「It was.」

LABEL: 0xCA76
STRING: I got the feeling she had just casually insulted me, but maybe it was just my imagination.

LABEL: 0xCAC8
STRING: Still, I could tell how much she wanted to go out there, whether I liked it or not.

LABEL: 0xCB16
STRING: I couldn't bear to look at that face...

LABEL: 0xCB76
STRING: 「...Okay, fine. Let's do this.」

LABEL: 0xCBA8
STRING: 「I'll go and catch it with that deep aquarium――」

LABEL: 0xCBEA
STRING: 「This, umm... Scalyfoot, was it?」

LABEL: 0xCC28
STRING: Her eyes instantly regained their luster.

LABEL: 0xCD1B
STRING: 「You will?!」

LABEL: 0xCD47
STRING: 「I told you I wouldn't lie.」

LABEL: 0xCDEC
STRING: I'll compromise.」

LABEL: 0xCE0B
STRING: A compromise, huh?

LABEL: 0xCE23
STRING: Well, whatever.

LABEL: 0xCE3B
STRING: With that, my rationality won out, and I was able to avoid Tokiwa throwing herself into the deep sea by herself.

LABEL: 0xCEB1
STRING: I quickly put on the diving suit with her help.

LABEL: 0xCEF1
STRING: And――

LABEL: 0xCF18
STRING: 「It's done!」

LABEL: 0xCF3B
STRING: After putting the helmet on, my vision was severely restricted.

LABEL: 0xCF77
STRING: I couldn't even move my head freely, so I could only see directly in front of me.

LABEL: 0xCFC5
STRING: Even if I forced myself to bend my head, I couldn't even look down at my feet.

LABEL: 0xD001
STRING: This might be the second time already, but I couldn't get used to this.

LABEL: 0xD035
STRING: Since I could hardly see myself, I called out to her.

LABEL: 0xD079
STRING: 「Tokiwa, are you sure it's on right?」

LABEL: 0xD113
STRING: 「It's perfect.」

LABEL: 0xD136
STRING: She gave me a thumbs-up while declaring that.

LABEL: 0xD164
STRING: ...Was this really okay?

LABEL: 0xD1A2
STRING: With a twinge of unease in my heart, I advanced toward the pressurization room with heavy steps.

LABEL: 0xD1F2
STRING: ...Oh, right. This place didn't open unless you used a keycard.

LABEL: 0xD244
STRING: I should have left mine with Tokiwa earlier...

LABEL: 0xD280
STRING: 「Hey, Tokiwa, I need the keycard here for a bit――」

LABEL: 0xD2BE
STRING: I was about to ask her to use the card, but the door opened on its own as I stood there in front of the room.

LABEL: 0xD330
STRING: Maybe it had been left open since yesterday.

LABEL: 0xD3DE
STRING: 「What is it?」

LABEL: 0xD401
STRING: 「Ah, no... it's nothing.」

LABEL: 0xD425
STRING: 「Just wait in front of this door until I get back.」

LABEL: 0xD4DB
STRING: 「Understood.」

LABEL: 0xD514
STRING: Tokiwa couldn't hide her fidgeting.

LABEL: 0xD54A
STRING: She was trying to busy herself with something even though there was nothing much to do...

LABEL: 0xD59C
STRING: She looked awfully restless.

LABEL: 0xD5BE
STRING: I wished we had the same wireless microphone Yukari used yesterday, just in case something happened...

LABEL: 0xD620
STRING: But there was no use worrying about that now since it was nowhere to be seen.

LABEL: 0xD64C
STRING: Well, it would work out somehow.

LABEL: 0xD672
STRING: 「Tokiwa, what time is it now?」

LABEL: 0xD702
STRING: 「Let's see... It says 11:33, so...」

LABEL: 0xD750
STRING: What's with that conversion...?

LABEL: 0xD770
STRING: 「If I don't return in half an hour, tell the others.」

LABEL: 0xD87D
STRING: 「Understood, sir!」

LABEL: 0xD8A9
STRING: ...Would this be okay?

LABEL: 0xD8C9
STRING: She was utterly ecstatic.

LABEL: 0xD8F1
STRING: 「See you later, then.」

LABEL: 0xD981
STRING: 「Take care.」

LABEL: 0xDA6B
STRING: Leaving behind a voice full of anticipation, the door to the pressurization room closed with a heavy sound.

LABEL: 0xDAB5
STRING: Left alone, I saw a metal door in front of me.

LABEL: 0xDAE9
STRING: There should be a button somewhere around here――

LABEL: 0xDB21
STRING: Dammit, my field of vision was so narrow.

LABEL: 0xDB43
STRING: It was hard to even look to the side.

LABEL: 0xDB65
STRING: Relying on my memory, I gave the general location a good thump.

LABEL: 0xDBD2
STRING: The door opened.

LABEL: 0xDBF0
STRING: I saw a shining lever on the right side.

LABEL: 0xDC1A
STRING: What an eerie sight...

LABEL: 0xDC4C
STRING: On the other hand, I was relieved to see something familiar.

LABEL: 0xDC88
STRING: I dragged my heavy body inside and dropped the lever.

LABEL: 0xDCC8
STRING: Soon, water started flowing in...

LABEL: 0xDCF2
STRING: 「Well then――」

LABEL: 0xDD10
STRING: The sound of being submerged in water.

LABEL: 0xDD30
STRING: Slowly and steadily, the water level rose.

LABEL: 0xDD64
STRING: I noticed that the deep aquarium I'd had in my left hand was now floating in the water around the area where the surface went past my chest.

LABEL: 0xDDC8
STRING: Overwhelmed by the force of the water, I had let go of it for a moment.

LABEL: 0xDE00
STRING: 「――Whoops.」

LABEL: 0xDE1C
STRING: I clasped it tightly.

LABEL: 0xDE42
STRING: If I let go of this, this really would be a waste of time.

LABEL: 0xDE82
STRING: That was the one thing I had to avoid―for Tokiwa's sake.

LABEL: 0xDEB8
STRING: Gradually, my vision was filled with water.

LABEL: 0xDEE8
STRING: 「――That's right, the night vision...」

LABEL: 0xDF16
STRING: I flipped the switch.

LABEL: 0xDF34
STRING: A click echoed through the enclosed space.

LABEL: 0xDFC5
STRING: My entire world was dyed in a unique color.

LABEL: 0xDFEF
STRING: Red-tinged water was spreading all around me.

LABEL: 0xE076
STRING: I closed my eyes briefly until the color correction was complete.

LABEL: 0xE0B6
STRING: ――The color of the deep sea was red.

LABEL: 0xE0DA
STRING: I would remember that.

LABEL: 0xE0FC
STRING: I opened my eyes.

LABEL: 0xE114
STRING: At the same time, the water flow came to a stop.

LABEL: 0xE142
STRING: The hatch opened quietly.

LABEL: 0xE168
STRING: 「I didn't expect my second time to come so soon――」

LABEL: 0xE1A4
STRING: With that, I set off into the deep sea once more.
